top_comment.text:
Actually i dont get why all people said that the heirs is the best drama..i 
think that the master's sun is better personally :p 
cast..plot..ost..everything is better~
its just because lee min ho is in there..lol﻿
top_comment.author: Ryan Chan

comments.text:
I love this song and I agree that Master's Sun was much better than Heirs I 
love LMH but he did not look like a teenager; I was just shocked that they 
cast him as a student. I also just adore to death So Ji Sup; I would 
positively marry him if I would be lucky enough to get a proposal. 
Personally I think he is a slightly better actor than Lee Min Ho but that 
is my personal preference. Please no body get mad I love LMH in Faith and 
BOF and so much more.

captions.text:
Are you hearing my heart 
Are you seeing my tear

Only one in the world 
Only one
It has to be you for me

Why do you 
run away from me

Why do you get 
far away from me

Please be my side 
Please hold my hand

If you love me 
You make me crazy of you
You make me cry
I feel like I can catch it

Like the wind that passes away
When you catch it

Love is done alone
What’s left is tears

Love so useless 
Love so stupid

Can I hug you 
for the last time

Can I say bye 
for the last time

Please don’t forget the happy 
And loving memories we had

You make me 
crazy of you
You make me cry
I feel like I can catch it

Like the wind that passes away
When you catch it

Love is done alone
What’s left is tears

Love so useless 
Love so stupid

When we meet 
again someday
Let’s not say bye then

Those words that my heart say 
I love you

Those words that my tears say
I’m sorry

Even if I try to collect it 
It just spills away

Love is done alone
What’s left is tears

Love so useless 
Love so stupid
